## ThreeJSX.Object3DNode type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Object3DNode<T, P> = Overwrite<Node<T, P>, {
    position?: Vector3;
    up?: Vector3;
    scale?: Vector3;
    rotation?: Euler;
    matrix?: Matrix4;
    quaternion?: Quaternion;
    layers?: Layers;
    dispose?: (() => void) | null;
    geometry?: JSX.Element | BufferGeometry | null;
    material?: JSX.Element | Material | null;
}> & EventHandlers;
```
